title: Question:

content: Hello everyone, I will help you understand the cryptocurrency mining, from A to I will lay out all the points that programs are needed for acceleration, how to set up, how to start, contacting    BTC

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: If I understood correctly, you're selling your service right?Better to post here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0If you're just sharing your knowledge, post here instead of asking to contact you directly, because the subject will be available for others and will be available on search like google.
